TextView.android:text: SATURN- The Sixth Planet from the Sun

Basic Information:
Type: Gas Giant
Order from Sun: 6th planet
Distance from Sun: ~1.43 billion km (~9.58 AU)
Diameter: 120,536 km (second largest planet)
Mass: ~5.683 × 10²⁶ kg (about 95 times Earth's mass)
Gravity: 10.44 m/s² (similar to Earth's gravity)

Orbital And Rotational Characteristics:
Revolution period (around Sun): 29.46 Earth years
Rotation period (on its own axis): 10.7 hours
Orbital Speed: 9.69 km/s
Axial Tilt: 26.73° (causes seasons)
Orbital Eccentricity: 0.054

Moons And Rings:
Number of Moons: 146 confirmed moons
Number of Rings: 7 main ring groups, composed mostly of ice

Surface And Atmosphere:
Surface Temperature:
Average: -178°C (-288°F)
Surface Composition: Gas-based, no solid surface
Atmosphere Type: Thick atmosphere
Main Gases in Atmosphere: Hydrogen (H₂), Helium (He), Methane (CH₄), Ammonia (NH₃)
Weather Conditions: Strong storms, winds up to 1,800 km/h (1,118 mph), famous hexagonal storm at its north pole
